short_summary: Vehicle maintenance and repair services for General Motors, Ford, and Dodge vehicles.
tags: Automotive and light truck maintenance and repair
Automotive repair facility located within 50Km of CFB Trenton
full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
==============================================

### Tender Title

* English: W0125-23WR14 Vehicle Maintenance and Repairs (GM, FORD, DODGE)
* French: W0125-23WR14 Réparations et entretien de véhicules (GM, FORD, DODGE

### Solicitation Number and Reference Number

* Solicitation Number: WS3745027709
* Reference Number: WS3745027709-Doc3775307422

### Tender and Amendment Details

* Publication Date: 2022-12-02
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-29T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 0
* Amendment Date: 2022-12-02

### Expected Contract Duration

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-01-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-01-31

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and 10 more...

### Geographic Scope

* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (excluded National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity and End User Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **End User Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

### Point of Contact

* **Contact Name:** Mike Littlefield (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14799143?extsite=MTQ3OTkxNDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada is seeking offers from offerors to provide up to three Regional Individual Standing Offers for the provision of vehicle repair and maintenance services for General Motors, Ford, and Dodge
